2093320.name: Coloring Pixels - Bakery Pack
2093320.description:
Bakery Book

This Bakery-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! All pictures depict various baked goods or scenes of bakeries!

Get your taste buds tingling coloring these sweet and savoury treats

Contents

The Bakery book unlocks the following images:
  • Bread Basket - 65x87
  • Ingredients - 80x72
  • Cupcake - 83x80
  • Loaf - 107x64
  • Victoria Sponge - 128x89
  • Inside the Bakery - 128x135
  • Pretzel - 137x134
  • Footprints - 138x122
  • Cornish Scone - 144x92
  • Dragons' Kitchen - 150x98
  • Big Cake - 160x154
  • Pies! - 164x168
  • Outside the Bakery - 166x177
  • Sausage Roll - 170x61
  • Baguette - 177x61
  • Donut - 180x97
  • Baker Mice - 180x169
  • Flour Mill - 201x198
  • Bakery Prep - 223x162
  • Bakery Stall - 224x180
